Package hardwareAbstraction

Interface Summary
RemoteCommands Contains a list of integer commands to communicate to the NXTRemoteMotor and NXTRemoteUltrasonicPoller.
UltrasonicPoller This class serves as a higher level abstraction of a ultrasonic sensor.
 

Class Summary
Claw Controls the Claw Motor.
ColorPoller This class is the hardware abstraction for the ColorSensor with additonal functionality built in.
Drive This class handles the driving motors, it is a modified version of the TwoWheeledRobot class from Lab4.
Forklift Handles movement of claw/grabber & center ultrasonic mechanism up and down.
LinePoller Detects grid lines with two rear floor facing color sensors other threads should call enteringLine to know when a new line has been detected
NXTRemoteCommand Handles RS485 communication on the master brick.
NXTRemoteMotor Class for handling the remote motor abstraction layer on the master brick.
NXTRemoteUltrasonicPoller Abstraction layer for the ultrasonic poller over RS485.
UltrasonicMotor Controls the Ultrasonic motor.
 

Enum Summary
ColorPoller.ObjectDetected Enum of the two types of blocks.
Forklift.ForkliftState Each state corresponds to a height for a function of the grabber/ultrasonic mechanism.
UltrasonicPoller.USPosition
